import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import images from "../../assets/images"; import './infoProduct.css'; import "bootstrap" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import request from "../../utils/request"; function InfoProduct(){ // let { id } = useParams(); const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); const id = urlParams.get('id'); console.log(id); const [infoProduct, setInfoProduct] = useState([]); const [dataAddProductToCart] = useState({ email: '', masp: '', soluong: '', tonggia: '', }); const getInfo = () => { request.get(`/api/infoProduct?id=${id}`) .then(res => { setInfoProduct(res.data[0]); }) .catch(e => { console.log(e); }) } // xử lý khi hết hàng vẫn cố chấp thêm const handleAddToCart = () => { request.post("/api/addToCart", ) } useEffect(() => { getInfo(); } , []); return (

{infoProduct.TENSP}

{infoProduct.GIABAN} {infoProduct.GIAGOC} 42%
đánh giá số sao
Màu sắc
Kích thước
) } export default InfoProduct;
